ing: 1 tablespoon garlic salt, or to taste
des: "This cream cheese and crab ball is a super easy and delicious snack.  Perfect for holiday get-togethers or anytime. Serve with buttery crackers."
ins: In a medium bowl, mix together the cream cheese, sour cream, crabmeat, and garlic salt. Form into a ball, and place on a serving plate. Cover the surface as well as you can with cocktail sauce. Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving.
